greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest integer of the form product (n+1)(n+2)...(n+k)/n!.
comment: Differs from A000984 at positions in A058008.
mathematica: a[n_] := Catch[ For[ k = n-2, True, k++, If[ IntegerQ[an = (n+k)!/n!^2], Throw[an]]]]; a[1]=1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 24}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 28 2012 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Sep 07 2002
